name: Power Platform Expert Consultant for Home Affairs FPS (2 of 2) (K09544)
description:
The Home Affairs FPS is actively investing in the modernization and digitalization of internal processes, replacing legacy systems with secure, scalable, and user-friendly solutions. Microsoft Power Platform has been selected as a strategic technology to support this transformation. To ensure sustainable internal capacity and autonomy, external consultants are required to support development, optimization, and knowledge transfer.

 
Responsibilities:
Design, develop, and optimize business applications using Microsoft Power Platform.
Implement automated workflows and digital forms to support administrative and operational processes.
Create and manage data models and authentic data sources to ensure data integrity and reliability.
Collaborate with internal stakeholders to define functional requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
Provide training and coaching to internal teams to foster long-term autonomy and skill development.
Contribute to reporting and monitoring tools to support decision-making and operational efficiency.
 
Required Technical Skills:


- Microsoft Power Platform:

Advanced experience with Power Apps (Canvas and Model-Driven apps).
Proficiency in Power Automate for building complex workflows and process automation.
Familiarity with Power BI for data visualization and reporting (optional but beneficial).
Experience with Dataverse (Common Data Service) for data modeling and integration.

- SharePoint Online:

Integration of Power Platform solutions with SharePoint lists and libraries.
Document management and permissions handling.

- Data Integration & Automation:

Experience with REST APIs, JSON, and custom connectors.
Knowledge of Azure Active Directory, IAM systems, and Asset Management platforms.
Ability to integrate with ERP systems such as SAP and other inventory or HR systems.

- Development & Governance:

Understanding of solution lifecycle management within Power Platform.
Familiarity with environment strategy, security roles, and data loss prevention policies.
Experience with ALM (Application Lifecycle Management) tools and practices.

- Soft Skills:

Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to work autonomously and proactively.
Experience in coaching and knowledge transfer.
